name: coex

stmt.origin: mp2an(wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0 ∘ c1)∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c1, universe)

comment: The composition of two sets is a set. (Contributed by NM, 15-Dec-2003.)
